original_text: You take care of them so that they grow quickly. They may even make flowers on the same morning that you plant them! But you will never have any fruit from them. You will only get trouble and pain that will never go away.
korean_text: 네가 심는 날에 울타리를 두르고 아침에 네 씨가 잘 발육하도록 하였으나 근심과 심한 슬픔의 날에 농작물이 없어지리라

sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 심지어 꽃을 만들 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But you will never have any fruit from them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 당신은 그것들에서 어떤 과일도 결코 얻지 못할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and pain that will never go away
